pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction and Clustering on the Torus by Conformal Prediction // Provides various tools of for clustering multivariate angular data on the torus. The package provides angular adaptations of usual clustering methods such as the k-means clustering, pairwise angular distances, which can be used as an input for distance-based clustering algorithms, and implements clustering based on the conformal prediction framework. Options for the conformal scores include scores based on a kernel density estimate, multivariate von Mises mixtures, and naive k-means clusters. Moreover, the package provides some basic data handling tools for angular data.
